alert.note: Alert for Latah (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 27 at 2:26PM MST until December 28 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Idaho... Washington... Paradise Creek at Moscow affecting Latah and Whitman Counties. .Heavy rain falling and melting snow will lead to rapid rises on Paradise Creek. Warm and windy weather Tuesday will also contribute to runoff from melting snow. Melting snow and ice may clog nearby drainage areas. For the Paradise Creek ...including Moscow...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Paradise Creek at Moscow. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Water will be up to the homes near the intersection of Bridge and Hillcrest. Intersection at 5th and Roosevelt will be flooded. Water will be out of the banks at the D Street bridge. Storm drains along Main Street will be backed up and overflowing. Mountainview Park will be flooded. Bike path along the creek near the University will be under 6 inches of water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM PST Tuesday the stage was near 10.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will remain above flood stage (9.2 feet) through this afternoon and evening. It will then fall late this evening. It may see additional rises above minor flood stage (9.2 feet) through Wednesday. - Flood stage is 9.2 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/spokane. The next statement will be issued at 1000 PM.late tonight at 100 AM PST.
